meanings: an authority of the academic world

vlive.korean: [귀여움을 잘해요 깜찍계의 최고권위자 이 윙크 지켜] 왜? 잘해요 귀여운데? [He's good at being cute] Why? You're good at it. It's cute. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 🕺툽을 보면 웨이브 대신 눈물을 쥐어짜게 된다니까요💦 (YEONJUN&SOOBIN teaching choreography of ‘Run Away’)
vlive.english: [He's good at being cute] Why? You're good at it. It's cute.

vlive.korean: [쉿! 쉬-잇! 쉿!][근엄 토끼] 리더의 권위예요! 조용히 하세요! [Shhh! Shh!] [Solemn bunny] This is the authority of the leader! Please keep it down! 듣기 View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.05 - Part.1
vlive.english: [Shhh! Shh!] [Solemn bunny] This is the authority of the leader! Please keep it down!

vlive.korean: 대표님, 너무 권위적이신 거 아니에요? Aren't you too bossy? 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep29_귀신 씐(?) 김수용의 강림!
[권위의 끝판왕] 진짜로. [Extreme bossiness] I'm not joking. 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep29_귀신 씐(?) 김수용의 강림!
권위있는 척 할 때, 내가! when you pretended to be authoritative! 듣기 View video AKMU : 제목을 뭘로하지
vlive.english: when you pretended to be authoritative!

examples.korean: the most authoritative book on the subject 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 주제에 대한 가장 권위 있는 책 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She was easily cowed by people in authority. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 권위를 가진 사람들에게는 쉽게 주눅이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was easily cowed by people in authority. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We were brought up to be respectful of authority. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 권위를 존중하도록 양육을 받고 자랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were brought up to be respectful of authority. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: his magisterial work ‘The Roman Wall in Scotland’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 권위 있는 연구서인 ‘스코틀랜드에 있는 로마 시대 방벽’ Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The authority of the central government was rapidly disintegrating. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 중앙 정부의 권위는 급속히 붕괴되고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The authority of the central government was rapidly disintegrating. Add to Wordbook
